# create table, cf1, cf2
# create 'my_table', 'col_family1_familydetails', 'col_family2_accounts'
# we never specify data type for data inside col family : store all in binary format (string, list, image , somg, video)
# everything is case sensitivity 
# create 'My_table', 'col_family1_familydetails', 'col_family2_accounts'
# --- delete process ---
# disable 'My_table'
# drop 'yourTableName'
# create 'yourTableName', 'f1', 'f2', 'f3'
alfredsnippet.name: > hbase create table INFO
